    Pages

    swiftydocsconfig

    Creating pages

    All Markdown files in the pages/ folder are converted to HTML pages. Each page can define metadata in front matter.

    Example pages/about.md:

    ---
title: About Our Team
layout: about
tags: 
  - team
  - company
---

## About Our Team
Welcome to our company!

    Front Matter & Data Variables

    Convention over Configuration

    This is a concept borrowed from Ruby on rails. Any layouts that are named after a folder will automatically be applied to any pages in that folder, without having to specify the layout explicitly. So any pages inside a folder called 'blog' will use the layout called 'blog.html' by default (if it exists).

    This site was built with Swifty, the super speedy static site generator.
